inputs.name: position
inputs.text: Defines the position of the dropdown according to its toggle.

inputs.name: id
inputs.text: Defines the id attribute. It will also be used on the dropdown's content with the suffix -content.

projection.name: [dropdown-toggle]
projection.text: Selects the content to be projected as the toggle button. It will always be visible.

projection.name: [dropdown-content]
projection.text: Selects the content to be projected in the dropdown panel. It will only be visible when the dropdown is opened.
